name: Brick Breaker Reloaded
description:
Simple Brick Breaker game that was developed for a study on Game Engagement. Player behaviour was recorded during gameplay to check if their engagement was higher on a system with Lootboxes or a system like an old ingame shop. This is the Lootbox Version. Gameplay will not change between the two types.

There are some special blocks that will trigger an Effect upon destruction like:

  • Explosions! (Everyone loves them)
  • Multiple Balls (juggle them all!)
  • Random block destructions  (MORE RNG!!!)
  • and even more (we can not spoil everything :P )

There are a total of 6 different Levels with 2 Themes. Game was developed by Mathias Bauer and Merih Türkoglu.
